sensorLocation.description: The location this sensor resides on

timestamp.description: The time this event was logged

startTimeOffsetNano.description: The time offset from the cycle start that the data point was sensed

dataPointDurationNano.description: The length of time this data point was valid

probability.description: The probability that this cycle node will be predicted once selected as a potential prediction

cycletype.description: The type of this cycle (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly

cycleStartTimeNano.description: The start time in nanoseceonds since epoch for this cycle

cycleDurationTimeNano.description: The duration time in nanoseceonds for this cycle

allowableStandardDeviationForEquality.description: The standard deviation allowed for two data point measurements to be considered equal

previousCycleNodeIndex.description: The current position of this cycle when saved, otherwise start at beginning.
